AI Description: libpciaccess is a library providing generic access to the PCI bus and devices for use in user-space programs. It allows user-space drivers to directly map PCI memory regions, perform bus transactions, and query devices on the PCI bus.
Core Features: Generic Access To Pci Bus & Devices, Direct Mapping Of Pci Memory Regions, Bus Transactions, Device Querying On The Pci Bus
General Tags: Library, Pci Bus Access, User-Space Drivers
